item.title: Fast and Private: How zkHub uses MPC to generate zk-proofs
item.description: Hello World! We’re thrilled to introduce you to zkHub - the future of proof generation that champions speed and privacy above all else. It’s highly likely that you’ve stumbled upon zero-knowledge proofs if you’ve had any engagement with the world of cryptocurrency. Zero-knowledge proofs are the art of convincing without giving away the secret. It’s like performing a magic trick where you demonstrate your knowledge, but the audience, though convinced of your knowledge, remains baffled about how you did it!
